faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a commercial shop in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: The pricing for a commercial shop in Sector 104 varies significantly based on its size, location within the complex (ground floor versus upper floors), visibility, and whether it is a lockable or leased unit. faqs.question: What are the common area maintenance charges for commercial shops in this area
faqs.answer: Common Area Maintenance CAM charges cover services like centralized air conditioning (if applicable), security, common area lighting, lift maintenance, housekeeping, and power backup services. These charges typically vary based on the complex developer and the quality of amenities provided. Investors should budget approximately INR 18 to INR 25 per square foot per month for CAM, though this figure should always be confirmed with the specific property management for an accurate assessment.
